ygData.subject: Re: Weapons of choice
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, a combine weapon is magical. They are nice weapons, but what you should really look into getting is a Dragoon Dirk. If my database of weapons is
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, a combine weapon is magical. They are nice weapons, but what you should
really look into getting is a Dragoon Dirk. If my database of weapons is
up-to-date, it would appear that there is only ONE combine weapon better
than the Dirk....The 2 Handed Combine Sword. All I can say is...DIRK ROCKS.
I just had the absolute BEST fortune to pick one up for free last night. I
think I will be very happy with it indeed...

Lulen
9th Rank

----- Original Message -----
From: Mr. Beeba <flpmc@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 19:15
Subject: [eqbards] Weapons of choice


> From: "Mr. Beeba" <flpmc@...>
>
> Hi,
>
> Where would i go about finding combine weapons and/or magic weapons?
> And another question, is a combine the same as a magic weapon? I know
> my friend can make me a magic sword, but it disappears after i log off
> unless i stick it in the bank. Any answer appreciated. If long email
> me directly please.
>
> flpmc@...
>
> Phil
>
